name: Medieval Mayhem
description:
Build your castle and destroy it in this online destruction game.
Defeat your ennemies and steal their gold to make it to the top, allowing you to build bigger and bigger!
The game also feature a solo campain to explore the game and earn more gold.

Medieval Mayhem let you build your castle brick by brick and then detroy it with a huge ballista equiped with boulders and bombs.
You start the game with some gold, but to build the castle of your dreams you will need more! Defeat your ennemies every day to be sure to earn all the gold you'll ever need and become the king of Medieval Mayhem.
